g.text: ‚Ä¢ Main Switch 2 has 7 wire nuts - most complex junction
‚Ä¢ White wires from vanity carry HOT - mark with black tape
‚Ä¢ Vanity switching junction occurs at the light fixture
‚Ä¢ All bathroom circuits require GFCI protection

text.style: font: 8px Arial; text-anchor: middle; writing-mode: tb;
font: 8px Arial; text-anchor: middle; writing-mode: tb;
font: 14px Arial; text-anchor: middle; font-weight: bold; fill: #007bff;

g.text: ‚Ä¢ Ground wires count as 1 conductor total

text.style: font: 9px Arial; text-anchor: middle; font-style: italic; fill: #6c757d;

g.text: This diagram shows code-compliant bathroom wiring with proper GFCI protection, box fill calculations, and wire nut specifications.
